page.title: 19NARROW ROADS
page.content: The roads are very narrow often with high banks. The long grass is no longer cut by the council and it is difficult to see round the corners and there are many bumps between cars.It is difficult to find the way as roads are not always signposted and houses just have a name and no other details. In winter the roads are quickly blocked during snowfalls particularly where the snow blows across the fields and there are no hedges. Farm tractors try to keep roads open but it is not always possible and sometimes the roads become impassable and then the school is closed. Sometimes it snows heavily during the day and then every one rushes home when the day is finished.
